mapper.select: select VC_NO, USER_NO, VC_ID, VC_SESSION, VC_NAME, CREATE_TIMESTAMP ,MAX_PARTICIPANTS ,STATUS from VIDEO_CALL where USER_NO = #{userNo} order by (CASE WHEN STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DESC ,CREATE_TIMESTAMP DESC

select vc.VC_NO ,vc.USER_NO ,vc.VC_ID ,vc.VC_SESSION ,vc.VC_NAME ,vc.CREATE_TIMESTAMP ,vc.MAX_PARTICIPANTS ,vc.STATUS ,m.USER_NAME ,m.NAME_SEED from VIDEO_CALL vc left join MEMBER m on(vc.USER_NO = m.USER_NO) left join VC_MEMBER vcm on(vc.VC_NO = vcm.VC_NO) where vcm.USER_NO = #{userNo} and vcm.status = 'U'
select VC_NO, USER_NO, VC_ID, VC_SESSION, VC_NAME, CREATE_TIMESTAMP ,MAX_PARTICIPANTS ,STATUS from VIDEO_CALL where USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VC_MEMBER (VC_NO, USER_NO, STATUS, ROLE_TYPE) VALUES ( (SELECT VC_NO FROM VIDEO_CALL WHERE USER_NO = #{hostUserNo}), (SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}), 'U', 'S' )
